Anyone know of a mod capable of this? Or a way to tweak the engine not to calculate the physics at all?

I just want things to hang in space so I can film them.

Hyperedit does not turn off physics but it does allow you to just hang things in space. Maybe need to combine it with "hack gravity" in the KSP 'cheat menu' (alt F12)

There is currently no way to turn off physics. Maybe if the devs implemented a pause button...

If you get hyperedit, and enable a bunch of the cheats, then physics doesn't have much of an effect. If you open "whack-a-kerbal", then you can spawn objects randomly out of no where, so there's another way to break physics. There are also some mods that make engines have a faster-than-light speed. Other than that, there's not too many objects. I would make you a mod myself, but I'm busy making a faster than light engine and model for myself. I make alot of mods, I just don't post them on the forums or on spaceport (or anywhere else for that matter).
If you're ship is wobbling, use the nonphysical time warp. This freezes all physics and stops the wobbling.
